title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in the 1980s face supernatural threats in their small town.

title: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more wicked than beasts.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer struggles with morality and family.

title: The Crown
description: A chronicle of the life of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations meet its darkest instincts.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in history to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Narcos
description: A gripping saga of the life and exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar and the DEA agents on his trail.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps.

title: Lucifer
description: The devil relocates to Los Angeles and opens a nightclub, but his life takes an unexpected turn.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
description: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home.

title: The Umbrella Academy
description: A dysfunctional family of adopted sibling superheroes reunite to solve the mystery of their father's death.

title: Ozark
description: A financial planner relocates his family to the Ozarks to launder money for a drug cartel.
